publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-523 Tommy Sheridan: Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to cancel its subscription to the British National Party magazine Spearhead and does not believe that the Parliament through its subscription should be helping to spread the Neo-Nazi and racist views contained in this publication.
S1M-523 Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine (lodged on 9 February 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-523 Tommy Sheridan: Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to cancel its subscription to the British National Party magazine Spearhead and does not believe that the Parliament through its subscription should be helping to spread the Neo-Nazi and racist views contained in this publication. Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr John McAllion
S1M-523 Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine (lodged on 9 February 2000) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-523 Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine (lodged on 9 February 2000) Bristow Muldoon*, Shona Robison*
S1M-523 Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine (lodged on 9 February 2000) Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Jamieson*

Supported by: Dr Elaine Murray, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr John McAllion, Fiona Hyslop, Bristow Muldoon, Shona Robison, Brian Adam, Trish Godman, Cathy Jamieson
S1M-523 Parliament Subscription to BNP Magazine (lodged on 9 February 2000) Elaine Smith*
